subject: CONFIRMED: Timezone issue verified - details in previous msgs
body:
## Confirmed - Wrong Days

See my previous messages for full details, but summary:

### Wrong Days (off by 1)
- "Weekly on Thursday" → shows Wednesday
- "Weekly on Tuesday" → shows Monday

### Correct Days
- "Weekly on Saturday" (2 PM) → shows Saturday ✅

### Pattern
Evening events (7+ PM EST) show 1 day BEFORE.
Afternoon events (2 PM EST) show correct day.

This matches your theory - UTC day boundary issue.

### Also
Practica Spark: `isRecurring: false` in API but user says it's weekly Monday. May need DB update.

-- Cronas
